issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
In this [Jenkins run|https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HDFS-Build/17253/testReport/org.apache.hadoop.hdfs/TestPersistBlocks/TestRestartDfsWithFlush], it fails on a cause which seems an DNS issue while trying to read response from connection.
{noformat}
java.io.EOFException: End of File Exception between local host is: "48dcc03d04a1/172.17.0.3"; destination host is: "localhost":39481; : java.io.EOFException; For more details see:  http://wiki.apache.org/hadoop/EOFException
